subject: College Athletics
Football
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: Boise State won’t play in a B.C.S. game, settling instead for something called the Maaco Bowl on Wednesday, and the program and its conference are missing out on millions of dollars.
snippet: Boise State won’t play in a B.C.S. game, settling instead for something called the Maaco Bowl on Wednesday, and the program and its conference are missing out on millions of dollars.
